Observed at: Wiarton Airport 10:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: 3.4°C
Wind: N 7 km/h

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
